sqlQuery.name: Counts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, count(DISTINCT taxon_id) AS organism_count, count(*) AS protein_count, max((SELECT count(*) FROM apidb.OrthologGroup)) AS group_count FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence

sqlQuery.name: Taxons
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, orthomcl_taxon_id AS taxon_id, nvl(parent_id, orthomcl_taxon_id) AS parent_id, three_letter_abbrev AS abbreviation, is_species, species_order AS sort_index, common_name, name FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon ORDER BY parent_id ASC, species_order ASC

sqlQuery.name: DataSummary
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, ot.name, ot.three_letter_abbrev, od.resource_name, od.resource_url, od.description FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot, apidb.OrthomclResource od WHERE od.orthomcl_taxon_id = ot.orthomcl_taxon_id AND ot.is_species != 0 ORDER BY ot.name

sqlQuery.name: ReleaseSummary
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, ot.name, ot.three_letter_abbrev, (SELECT count(DISTINCT eas.aa_sequence_id) FROM dots.ExternalAASequence eas WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id) AS sequences, (SELECT count(DISTINCT ogs.aa_sequence_id) FROM dots.externalAASequence eas, apidb.OrthologGroupAASequence ogs WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id) AS clustered_sequences, (SELECT count(DISTINCT ogs.ortholog_group_id) FROM dots.externalAASequence eas, apidb.OrthologGroupAASequence ogs WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id) AS groups FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ot.is_species != 0 ORDER BY ot.name
